title: 146,000 could live
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cancer

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cancer - Psychological aspects
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/American Cancer Society
description: Dramatically presents each of the seven danger signals for cancer. Five are represented by people cured of cancer, one by a woman who lost her son to cancer and one by a man who notices a danger signal but found, when he went to a doctor, that he did not have cancer. Originally presented on television. Narrated by Charles S. Cameron.
